metadata.title: CVE-2015-7183 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Integer overflow in the PL_ARENA_ALLOCATE implementation in NetscapePortable Runtime (NSPR) in Mozilla Network Security Services (NSS) before3.19.2.1 and 3.20.x before 3.20.1, as used in Firefox before 42.0 andFirefox ESR 38.x before 38.4 and other products, allows remote attackers toexecute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory corruption andapplication crash) via unspecified vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-7183` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libnspr4 - 2:4.10.10-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
libnspr4-0d - 2:4.10.10-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
No subscription required

firefox - 42.0+build2-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
firefox-globalmenu - 42.0+build2-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
firefox-mozsymbols - 42.0+build2-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
firefox-testsuite - 42.0+build2-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
No subscription required

thunderbird - 1:38.4.0+build3-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
thunderbird-globalmenu - 1:38.4.0+build3-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
thunderbird-gnome-support - 1:38.4.0+build3-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
thunderbird-mozsymbols - 1:38.4.0+build3-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
thunderbird-testsuite - 1:38.4.0+build3-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
xul-ext-calendar-timezones - 1:38.4.0+build3-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
xul-ext-gdata-provider - 1:38.4.0+build3-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
xul-ext-lightning - 1:38.4.0+build3-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
No subscription required

virtualbox - 4.3.36-dfsg-1+deb8u1ubuntu1.14.04.1
virtualbox-dkms - 4.3.36-dfsg-1+deb8u1ubuntu1.14.04.1
virtualbox-guest-dkms - 4.3.36-dfsg-1+deb8u1ubuntu1.14.04.1
virtualbox-guest-source - 4.3.36-dfsg-1+deb8u1ubuntu1.14.04.1
virtualbox-guest-utils - 4.3.36-dfsg-1+deb8u1ubuntu1.14.04.1
virtualbox-guest-x11 - 4.3.36-dfsg-1+deb8u1ubuntu1.14.04.1
virtualbox-qt - 4.3.36-dfsg-1+deb8u1ubuntu1.14.04.1
virtualbox-source - 4.3.36-dfsg-1+deb8u1ubuntu1.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: nspr package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:4.10.10-0ubuntu0.14.04.1').
firefox package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '42.0+build2-0ubuntu0.14.04.1').
thunderbird package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:38.4.0+build3-0ubuntu0.14.04.1').
virtualbox package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.3.36-dfsg-1+deb8u1ubuntu1.14.04.1').
